verses.roman:
kona brahmāṇḍa śata-koṭi, kona lakṣa-koṭi
kona niyuta-koṭi, kona koṭi-koṭi

synonyms: kona brahmāṇḍa—some universes; śata-koṭi—one billion yojanas; kona—some; lakṣa-koṭi—one trillion yojanas; kona—some; niyuta-koṭi—ten trillion; kona—some; koṭi-koṭi—one hundred trillion.
translation: " 'Some of the universes are one billion yojanas, some one trillion, some ten trillion and some one hundred trillion yojanas. Thus they are almost unlimited in area.
